amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to ensure that the United States will not negotiate or support treaties that violate Americans' Second Amendment rights under the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 710 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 710 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Leahy.
